actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a demonstration project in Lake George, and a portion of Deep River, Indiana.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a demonstration project for the removal of silt and other materials from Lake George and a portion of Deep River, Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a demonstration project in Lake George, and a portion of Deep River, Indiana.
